pkgmetadata.longdescription: # YouTube Lounge API wrapper written in Python (WIP)## SetupActivate virtual environment:- create `python -m venv .venv`- activate `source .venv/bin/activate`## How to use1. Now you need a screen_id and loungeToken. For now the easiest way is through manual pairing. - Try `python manual_pairing.py` and enter the pairing code from the YouTube app settings.2. Copy variables_example.py to variables.py and enter screen id and lounge token there.3. `python main.py`## Thanks- https://github.com/henriquekano/youtube-lounge-api### Publish to pypi1. Update pyproject.toml2. `python -m build`3. `python -m twine upload dist/*`
